meanings: Noun (손잡이가 달린 얕은) 냄비[팬] (→frying pan, saucepan)

vlive.korean: 그리고 이제 팬분들이 또 그... And now, the fans... 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 소통타임🐻
또 팬분들한테 인정을 받는 게 아닐까요? recognition from fans right? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산이의 소소한 일상🥰
팬들이 가수 따라오는 거면 뭐... If "like singer, like fan" is true... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 먹을 거 주는 사람 좋은 사람.. 귀여운 사람 더 좋은 사람..🦊 (YEONJUN’s communicating&eating V)
vlive.english: If "like singer, like fan" is true...

vlive.korean: 작년이... '더 팬'이 재작년... Last year... "The Fan" was two years ago... 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
vlive.english: Last year... "The Fan" was two years ago...

vlive.korean: [팬들은 가수 따라가는 거자너] 팬들이 가수 따라간다고! [Fans follow their singers' footsteps] Like singer, like fan! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 먹을 거 주는 사람 좋은 사람.. 귀여운 사람 더 좋은 사람..🦊 (YEONJUN’s communicating&eating V)
vlive.english: [Fans follow their singers' footsteps] Like singer, like fan!

examples.korean: Rival fans hurled abuse at each other. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경쟁 팀의 팬들이 서로에게 욕설을 퍼부었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rival fans hurled abuse at each other. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He stopped to receive hugs and kisses from the fans. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 걸음을 멈추고 팬들의 포옹과 키스를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He stopped to receive hugs and kisses from the fans. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The game was marred by the behaviour of drunken fans. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 경기는 술 취한 팬들의 행동 때문에 망쳐졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The game was marred by the behaviour of drunken fans. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The players saluted the fans before leaving the field. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 선수들은 경기장을 떠나기 전에 팬들에게 절을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The players saluted the fans before leaving the field. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: football fans whose support for their team borders on idolatry 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자기 팀에게 숭배에 가까운 지지를 보내는 축구 팬들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: football fans whose support for their team borders on idolatry Add to Wordbook
